alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, EAST CENTRAL RIPLEY, SOUTHERN DEARBORN AND CENTRAL BOONE COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 832 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Moores Hill, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Rising Sun, Milan, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, French, Hartford, Mount Sinai, Pate, Belleview, Cold Springs, Waterloo, Rabbit Hash and Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
